title: (Amendment) Regulations 2021 and come into operation on 30th July 2021.
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Bovine Viral Diarrhoea
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Bovine Viral Diarrhoea 

(Amendment) Regulations 2021 and come into operation on 30th July 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited bovine viral diarrhoea (amendment) regulation 2021 come operation 30th july 2021

title: (Amendment) Regulations 2021 and come into operation on 30th July 2021.
heading: 2. The Bovine Viral Diarrhoea Regulations 2017 are amended by deleting
text_raw:
2. The Bovine Viral Diarrhoea Regulations 2017 are amended by deleting 

Regulation 7. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 July, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [412] 3
text_norm: 2 bovine viral diarrhoea regulation 2017 amended deleting regulation 7 given official seal 30 july 2021 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 3rd august 2021 412 3

title: (Amendment) Regulations 2021 and come into operation on 30th July 2021.
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

Regulation 7 is now deemed to be superfluous to the Regulations and is thus 
being deleted. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [412]
